title: Session 01 — Trouble in Bryn Shander
body:
# Recap

The party arrived in **Bryn Shander** during heavy snow. Rumors mentioned giants harassing the Ten-Towns.

### Key Events
- Met Sheriff *Markham Southwell* and Speaker *Duvessa Shane*.
- A frost giant scouting party searched for *Artus Cimber*.
- Party defended the walls; townsfolk thankful.

### Hooks
- Follow leads on **Artus Cimber**.
- Seek out the wandering giant ally **Harshnag**.

title: Harshnag the Grim (NPC)
body:
A battle-hardened **frost giant** who opposes the Ordning's chaos.

- Favors mortals who stand against monstrous giants.
- Often roams the **Spine of the World**.
- Can guide the party to the **Eye of the All-Father**.

title: Location — Eye of the All-Father
body:
Ancient giant temple hidden in the mountains.

- Houses the oracle of **Annam**.
- Answers questions when proper rites are observed.
- Crucial to understanding the **Ordning** upheaval.

title: House Rule — Critical Hits
body: **Crits:** Roll damage dice twice (`2d`) + modifiers once. Brutal Critical features add extra dice after doubling.

title: Faction — Harpers
body: A semi-secret network promoting equality and opposing tyranny. Potential patrons or quest-givers in the North.

title: Acid Splash
body:
# Acid Splash (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Dex save by one or two creatures within 5 ft of each other; a target takes 1d6 acid damage (scales with level).

title: Mage Hand
body:
# Mage Hand (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

Create a spectral hand to manipulate objects (up to 10 lb). Can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 lb.

title: Guidance
body:
# Guidance (Divination cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Touch a willing creature; once before the spell ends, the target can add 1d4 to one ability check.

title: Prestidigitation
body:
# Prestidigitation (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Up to 1 hour

Perform minor magical effects: clean/soil, flavor, light/snuff a small flame, create a trinket, etc.

title: Shield
body:
# Shield (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when hit or targeted by Magic Missile)
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

An invisible barrier gives +5 AC until start of your next turn; you also take no damage from Magic Missile.

title: Cure Wounds
body:
# Cure Wounds (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

A creature you touch regains 1d8 + your spellcasting modifier HP (more when cast at higher levels).

title: Bless
body:
# Bless (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of holy water)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Up to three creatures gain +1d4 to attack rolls and saving throws (more targets when cast at higher levels).

title: Misty Step
body:
# Misty Step (2nd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Self
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space you can see.

title: Fireball
body:
# Fireball (3rd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 150 ft
Components: V,S,M (a tiny ball of bat guano and sulfur)
Duration: Instant

A 20-foot-radius explosion deals 8d6 fire damage (Dex save for half). Damage increases by 1d6 per slot above 3rd.

title: Counterspell
body:
# Counterspell (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when a creature within 60 ft casts a spell)
Range: 60 ft
Components: S
Duration: Instant

Interrupt a creature in the process of casting. If the spell is 3rd level or lower, it fails; otherwise make an ability check.

title: Blade Ward
body:
# Blade Ward (Abjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from weapon attacks until the end of your next turn.

title: Chill Touch
body:
# Chill Touch (Necromancy cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

Ranged spell attack; 1d8 necrotic damage and no healing; target is a ghostly skeletal hand clinging to it until your next turn (undead have disadvantage on attack rolls against you).

title: Dancing Lights
body:
# Dancing Lights (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (phosphorus, wychwood, or glowworm)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Create up to four torch-sized lights that shed dim light; they can move and combine into a glowing humanoid form.

title: Druidcraft
body:
# Druidcraft (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant or up to 1 minute

Whispering to nature produces minor effects: predict weather, create sensory effects, light/snuff a candle, or cause a flower to bloom.

title: Eldritch Blast
body:
# Eldritch Blast (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Make a ranged spell attack for 1d10 force damage. Beams increase with level and can target the same or different creatures.

title: Fire Bolt
body:
# Fire Bolt (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Ranged spell attack; 1d10 fire damage; ignites flammable unattended objects.

title: Friends
body:
# Friends (Enchantment cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: S,M (cosmetics)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

You gain advantage on Charisma checks directed at one non-hostile creature. Afterward, it realizes you used magic and may become hostile.

title: Light
body:
# Light (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,M (firefly or phosphorescent moss)
Duration: 1 hour

Object sheds bright light in a 20‑ft radius (dim light +20 ft). If object is worn/carried, save negates.

title: Mending
body:
# Mending (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (two lodestones)
Duration: Instant

Repairs a break or tear in an object (no larger than 1 foot in any dimension).

title: Message
body:
# Message (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (copper wire)
Duration: 1 round

Point at a creature and whisper a message; it can reply in a whisper only you can hear.

title: Minor Illusion
body:
# Minor Illusion (Illusion cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: S,M (fleece)
Duration: 1 minute

Create a sound or an image of an object (5‑ft cube). Investigation check can reveal the illusion.

title: Poison Spray
body:
# Poison Spray (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Target makes a Con save or takes 1d12 poison damage.

title: Produce Flame
body:
# Produce Flame (Conjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 10 minutes

A flame appears in your hand, shedding bright/dim light. You can hurl it as a ranged spell attack (1d8 fire).

title: Ray of Frost
body:
# Ray of Frost (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Ranged spell attack; 1d8 cold damage and target’s speed is reduced by 10 ft until your next turn.

title: Resistance
body:
# Resistance (Abjuration cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (miniature cloak)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Touch a willing creature; once before the spell ends, the target can add 1d4 to one saving throw.

title: Sacred Flame
body:
# Sacred Flame (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Target makes a Dex save or takes 1d8 radiant damage; target gains no cover bonus from the save.

title: Shillelagh
body:
# Shillelagh (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (mistletoe, shamrock leaf, club/quaterstaff)
Duration: 1 minute

Imbue a club or quarterstaff; it uses your spellcasting ability for attack/damage and deals 1d8 damage. Weapon becomes magical.

title: Shocking Grasp
body:
# Shocking Grasp (Evocation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Melee spell attack; 1d8 lightning damage and target can’t take reactions until the start of its next turn (advantage if target wears metal armor).

title: Spare the Dying
body:
# Spare the Dying (Necromancy cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Stabilize a creature at 0 HP; the target becomes stable.

title: Thaumaturgy
body:
# Thaumaturgy (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: Up to 1 minute

Manifest minor wonders: booming voice, flickering flames, tremors, doors fly open, etc.

title: Thorn Whip
body:
# Thorn Whip (Transmutation cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (plant stem with thorns)
Duration: Instant

Melee spell attack at range; 1d6 piercing damage and pull the creature up to 10 ft closer to you if it’s Large or smaller.

title: True Strike
body:
# True Strike (Divination cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 round

On your next turn, you gain advantage on your first attack roll against the target (assuming the spell hasn’t ended).

title: Vicious Mockery
body:
# Vicious Mockery (Enchantment cantrip)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Target that can hear you makes a Wis save or takes 1d4 psychic damage and has disadvantage on its next attack roll before the end of its next turn.

title: Alarm
body:
# Alarm (1st-level abjuration, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (a tiny bell and silver wire)
Duration: 8 hours

Set an alarm on an area/object. Choose audible or mental alert when a Tiny+ creature enters.

title: Burning Hands
body:
# Burning Hands (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (15‑ft cone)
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Creatures in a 15‑ft cone make a Dex save or take 3d6 fire (half on save). Ignites unattended flammables.

title: Charm Person
body:
# Charm Person (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 hour

Humanoid makes a Wis save (advantage if you/your allies are fighting it). On a fail, it is charmed by you until the spell ends.

title: Color Spray
body:
# Color Spray (1st-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (15‑ft cone)
Components: V,S,M (tiny pinch of powder or sand colored red, yellow, and blue)
Duration: 1 round

Dazzling colors blind creatures in order of current HP, affecting 6d10 HP of creatures.

title: Comprehend Languages
body:
# Comprehend Languages (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (soot and salt)
Duration: 1 hour

Understand literal meaning of any spoken language you hear and read written text you touch (1 page/min).

title: Detect Magic
body:
# Detect Magic (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Sense magic within 30 ft; you learn the school with an action to see an aura around a visible creature or object.

title: Disguise Self
body:
# Disguise Self (1st-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 hour

Change your appearance (including clothing/armor) within the same body shape. Investigation vs your spell save DC to see through it.

title: Expeditious Retreat
body:
# Expeditious Retreat (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

You can take the Dash action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

title: False Life
body:
# False Life (1st-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (a small amount of alcohol)
Duration: 1 hour

Bolster yourself with a facsimile of life, gaining 1d4 + 4 temporary hit points (more at higher slots).

title: Feather Fall
body:
# Feather Fall (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when you or a creature within 60 ft falls)
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,M (small feather or piece of down)
Duration: 1 minute

Up to five falling creatures’ rate of descent slows to 60 ft/round; they take no fall damage on landing.

title: Fog Cloud
body:
# Fog Cloud (1st-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Create a 20‑ft‑radius sphere of fog; area is heavily obscured. The fog spreads around corners.

title: Goodberry
body:
# Goodberry (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (a sprig of mistletoe)
Duration: Instant

Up to 10 berries appear; each restores 1 HP and provides nourishment for a day when eaten.

title: Grease
body:
# Grease (1st-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (pork rind or butter)
Duration: 1 minute

Slick grease covers a 10‑ft square; creatures entering or starting turn there must succeed on a Dex save or fall prone.

title: Guiding Bolt
body:
# Guiding Bolt (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

Ranged spell attack for 4d6 radiant damage; the next attack roll against the target before your next turn has advantage.

title: Healing Word
body:
# Healing Word (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

A creature of your choice regains 1d4 + your spellcasting modifier HP (more at higher slots).

title: Hellish Rebuke
body:
# Hellish Rebuke (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 reaction (when you are damaged by a creature within 60 ft)
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

The creature makes a Dex save; it takes 2d10 fire damage (half on save).

title: Heroism
body:
# Heroism (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

A willing creature is immune to being frightened and gains temporary HP equal to your spellcasting ability mod each turn.

title: Identify
body:
# Identify (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (pearl worth 100 gp and owl feather)
Duration: Instant

Learn properties and attunement of a magic item, or which spell affects a creature/object.

title: Jump
body:
# Jump (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (grasshopper’s hind leg)
Duration: 1 minute

The creature’s jump distance is tripled.

title: Longstrider
body:
# Longstrider (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (pinch of dirt)
Duration: 1 hour

The target’s speed increases by 10 feet for the duration.

title: Mage Armor
body:
# Mage Armor (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (a piece of cured leather)
Duration: 8 hours

A willing creature not wearing armor has AC = 13 + Dex modifier.

title: Magic Missile
body:
# Magic Missile (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Create three glowing darts of force that automatically hit; each deals 1d4+1 force. More darts at higher slots.

title: Protection from Evil and Good
body:
# Protection from Evil and Good (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (holy water or powdered silver and iron)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Protects against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead: disadvantage to attack you, can’t charm/frighten/possess you.

title: Purify Food and Drink
body:
# Purify Food and Drink (1st-level transmutation, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

All nonmagical food and drink in a 5‑ft radius sphere centered on a point of your choice is purified and rendered free of poison and disease.

title: Sanctuary
body:
# Sanctuary (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (small silver mirror)
Duration: 1 minute

Ward a creature; creatures must make a Wis save to attack it. The warded creature ends the spell if it attacks or casts a spell at an enemy.

title: Shield of Faith
body:
# Shield of Faith (1st-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (small parchment with a bit of holy text)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

A shimmering field appears around a creature of your choice, granting +2 bonus to AC.

title: Silent Image
body:
# Silent Image (1st-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of fleece)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create the image of an object/creature/visible phenomenon no larger than a 15‑ft cube; no sound/smell/temperature.

title: Sleep
body:
# Sleep (1st-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S,M (a pinch of fine sand, rose petals, or a cricket)
Duration: 1 minute

Sends creatures into a magical slumber affecting 5d8 HP of creatures, starting with the lowest current HP.

title: Speak with Animals
body:
# Speak with Animals (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 10 minutes

You gain the ability to comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts for the duration.

title: Tenser's Floating Disk
body:
# Tenser's Floating Disk (1st-level conjuration, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (drop of mercury)
Duration: 1 hour

A 3‑ft‑diameter disk of force appears, 3 ft above the ground, that follows you and can carry up to 500 pounds.

title: Thunderwave
body:
# Thunderwave (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (15‑ft cube)
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

A wave of thunderous force sweeps out; Con save or take 2d8 thunder and be pushed 10 ft (half and no push on save).

title: Unseen Servant
body:
# Unseen Servant (1st-level conjuration, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (a piece of string and a bit of wood)
Duration: 1 hour

Create an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks you command (Strength 2, AC 10, 1 HP).

title: Witch Bolt
body:
# Witch Bolt (1st-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (twig from a tree struck by lightning)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Make a ranged spell attack for 1d12 lightning; on subsequent turns, use an action to deal 1d12 lightning automatically while maintaining the link.

title: Detect Evil and Good
body:
# Detect Evil and Good (1st-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

For the duration, you know if there is an aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 ft of you, as well as any place/object that has been magically consecrated or desecrated.

title: Detect Poison and Disease
body:
# Detect Poison and Disease (1st-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (yew leaf)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Sense the presence and location of poisons, poisonous creatures, and diseases within 30 ft; also identify the kind of poison, creature, or disease in each case.

title: Create or Destroy Water
body:
# Create or Destroy Water (1st-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (drop of water or grains of sand)
Duration: Instant

Create up to 10 gallons of clean water or destroy the same amount in an open container; alternatively, create rain in a 30‑ft cube for difficult terrain and extinguishing flames.

title: Aid
body:
# Aid (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (tiny strip of white cloth)
Duration: 8 hours

Up to three creatures' max HP and current HP increase by 5 (more at higher slots).

title: Alter Self
body:
# Alter Self (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Change appearance, grow natural weapons, or adapt to water (amphibious + swim speed).

title: Arcane Lock
body:
# Arcane Lock (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (gold dust worth 25 gp)
Duration: Until dispelled

Magically locks a door, chest, etc.; DC to open increases by 10; you can set who bypasses it.

title: Barkskin
body:
# Barkskin (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (oak bark)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Target's skin becomes bark-like; AC can't be less than 16, regardless of armor/shield.

title: Blindness/Deafness
body:
# Blindness/Deafness (2nd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: 1 minute

Con save or the target is blinded or deafened; repeat save at end of each of its turns to end.

title: Blur
body:
# Blur (2nd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Your body becomes blurred; creatures have disadvantage on attacks against you if they rely on sight.

title: Calm Emotions
body:
# Calm Emotions (2nd-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Suppress strong emotions in a 20‑ft-radius sphere; can end charm or make targets indifferent for the duration.

title: Continual Flame
body:
# Continual Flame (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (ruby dust worth 50 gp)
Duration: Until dispelled

Create a flame that burns without heat or fuel; it can't be extinguished and sheds normal light.

title: Darkness
body:
# Darkness (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,M (bat fur and pitch)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Magical darkness fills a 15‑ft-radius sphere; nonmagical light can't illuminate it; darkvision can't see through it.

title: Darkvision
body:
# Darkvision (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (bit of fur and a drop of ink)
Duration: 8 hours

Give a willing creature 60‑ft darkvision for the duration.

title: Detect Thoughts
body:
# Detect Thoughts (2nd-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (copper piece)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Read surface thoughts; probe deeper with a Wis save; can search for minds within 30 ft.

title: Enhance Ability
body:
# Enhance Ability (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (fur or feather)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Give a creature advantage on checks for one ability; some modes grant extra benefits (e.g., +2d6 temp carry cap).

title: Find Traps
body:
# Find Traps (2nd-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

You sense the presence of traps within line of sight, but not their exact location or how to disable them.

title: Flaming Sphere
body:
# Flaming Sphere (2nd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (tallow, brimstone, powdered iron)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

A 5‑ft-diameter sphere of fire appears; ram it as a bonus action; 2d6 fire (Dex save half).

title: Gentle Repose
body:
# Gentle Repose (2nd-level necromancy, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (salt and copper piece)
Duration: 10 days

Protects a corpse from decay and prevents it from becoming undead; extends time limits on raising the target.

title: Gust of Wind
body:
# Gust of Wind (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (60‑ft line)
Components: V,S,M (legumes)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

A strong line of wind pushes creatures, disperses gas, and makes movement against it difficult terrain.

title: Heat Metal
body:
# Heat Metal (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (iron and flame)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Cause a manufactured metal object to glow red-hot; 2d8 fire damage and disadvantage on attacks/ability checks while holding/wearing it.

title: Hold Person
body:
# Hold Person (2nd-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (small piece of straight iron)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Wis save or paralyzed (humanoid). Target repeats save at end of each turn; more targets with higher slots.

title: Invisibility
body:
# Invisibility (2nd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (eyelash encased in gum arabic)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

A creature becomes invisible until it attacks or casts a spell; equipment carried is invisible as well.

title: Knock
body:
# Knock (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Opens a locked, barred, or stuck object; suppresses Arcane Lock for 10 minutes.

title: Levitate
body:
# Levitate (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (small leather loop or piece of golden wire)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

One creature/object rises and can move vertically; push/pull along surfaces to move horizontally.

title: Lesser Restoration
body:
# Lesser Restoration (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

End one disease or one condition: blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.

title: Locate Object
body:
# Locate Object (2nd-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (forked twig)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Sense direction to a familiar object within 1,000 ft; blocked by lead or running water (per DM).

title: Magic Weapon
body:
# Magic Weapon (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

A nonmagical weapon becomes +1 (increases with higher slots).

title: Mirror Image
body:
# Mirror Image (2nd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

Create three illusory duplicates that make you harder to hit; d20 check to determine if an attack targets a duplicate.

title: Pass without Trace
body:
# Pass without Trace (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (ashes from a burned leaf of mistletoe and a sprig of spruce)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

A veil of shadows grants +10 to Stealth checks and prevents tracking except by magical means.

title: Prayer of Healing
body:
# Prayer of Healing (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Up to six creatures regain 2d8 + your spellcasting modifier HP (more at higher slots).

title: Protection from Poison
body:
# Protection from Poison (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 hour

Neutralizes one poison affecting the target; gives advantage on saves vs poison and resistance to poison damage.

title: Rope Trick
body:
# Rope Trick (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (powdered corn extract and twisted loop of parchment)
Duration: 1 hour

A rope rises and hangs; an extradimensional space opens at the top that fits up to eight Medium creatures.

title: Scorching Ray
body:
# Scorching Ray (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Create three rays of fire; make a ranged spell attack for each (2d6 fire each). More rays at higher slots.

title: See Invisibility
body:
# See Invisibility (2nd-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (pinch of talc and powdered silver)
Duration: 1 hour

You can see invisible creatures and objects, as well as into the Ethereal Plane within 10 ft.

title: Shatter
body:
# Shatter (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (a chip of mica)
Duration: Instant

A sudden loud ringing noise; Con save or 3d8 thunder in a 10‑ft radius sphere (disadvantage for inorganic material).

title: Silence
body:
# Silence (2nd-level illusion, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create a 20‑ft-radius sphere of silence; no sound can be created or pass through; creatures are deafened within.

title: Spider Climb
body:
# Spider Climb (2nd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (bit of spiderweb)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

The target can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check; gains 30‑ft climb speed.

title: Spiritual Weapon
body:
# Spiritual Weapon (2nd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 bonus action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

Create a floating spectral weapon; bonus‑action attack for 1d8 + modifier force damage (more at higher slots).

title: Suggestion
body:
# Suggestion (2nd-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,M (snake’s tongue and honeycomb or drop of sweet oil)
Duration: Concentration, up to 8 hours

Influence a creature with a reasonable course of activity; Wis save negates; ends if you or your companions damage it.

title: Warding Bond
body:
# Warding Bond (2nd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (pair of platinum rings worth 50 gp each, worn by you and target)
Duration: 1 hour

You and the target gain +1 AC and saves, resistance to all damage; you take the same damage the target takes.

title: Web
body:
# Web (2nd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of spiderweb)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Thick, sticky webs fill a 20‑ft cube; area is difficult terrain; Dex save or restrained (Str check to break, or fire burns webs).

title: Animate Dead
body:
# Animate Dead (3rd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S,M (drop of blood, flesh, and bone)
Duration: Instant

Create or reassert control over skeletons or zombies. At higher slots, animate more undead.

title: Beacon of Hope
body:
# Beacon of Hope (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Choose any creatures; they have advantage on Wis saves and death saves, and regain max HP from healing.

title: Bestow Curse
body:
# Bestow Curse (3rd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Wis save or target suffers a chosen effect: disadvantage on checks/saves, vulnerability, wasted turn, or DM options.

title: Blink
body:
# Blink (3rd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 minute

At end of each turn, roll d20; on 11+, you vanish into the Ethereal Plane until your next turn, reappearing in same/different spot.

title: Call Lightning
body:
# Call Lightning (3rd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Storm cloud appears; each turn, call down a lightning bolt (Dex save or 3d10 lightning).

title: Clairvoyance
body:
# Clairvoyance (3rd-level divination)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 1 mile
Components: V,S,M (focus worth 100 gp)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create invisible sensor to hear or see a location within range, familiar or obvious.

title: Conjure Animals
body:
# Conjure Animals (3rd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Summon fey spirits as beasts: 2 of CR 1, 4 of CR 1/2, 8 of CR 1/4, or 16 of CR 1/8.

title: Dispel Magic
body:
# Dispel Magic (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

End spell of 3rd level or lower. For higher, ability check against DC 10 + spell’s level.

title: Fear
body:
# Fear (3rd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (30-ft cone)
Components: V,S,M (white feather or heart)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Creatures in cone Wis save or drop items and run away (Dash each turn).

title: Fly
body:
# Fly (3rd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (wing feather)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Creature touched gains 60-ft fly speed for duration.

title: Gaseous Form
body:
# Gaseous Form (3rd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (gauze and smoke)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Creature becomes a misty cloud with resistances and ability to pass through small openings.

title: Haste
body:
# Haste (3rd-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (licorice root)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target doubles speed, +2 AC, advantage on Dex saves, extra action each turn; lethargy afterward.

title: Hypnotic Pattern
body:
# Hypnotic Pattern (3rd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: S,M (incense, crystal rod)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

30-ft cube pattern; Wis save or become charmed/incapacitated with speed 0.

title: Lightning Bolt
body:
# Lightning Bolt (3rd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (100-ft line)
Components: V,S,M (fur and rod of amber)
Duration: Instant

Line of lightning 100x5 ft; Dex save or 8d6 lightning damage.

title: Major Image
body:
# Major Image (3rd-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of fleece)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create image with sound, smell, temperature; 20-ft cube size; Investigation check reveals.

title: Remove Curse
body:
# Remove Curse (3rd-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

End all curses on target; also ends attunement to cursed items.

title: Revivify
body:
# Revivify (3rd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (diamonds worth 300 gp)
Duration: Instant

Touch creature that died within last minute; it returns to life with 1 HP.

title: Sending
body:
# Sending (3rd-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Unlimited
Components: V,S,M (short fine copper wire)
Duration: 1 round

Send a 25-word message to a creature; it can reply. If on another plane, 5% chance message fails.

title: Sleet Storm
body:
# Sleet Storm (3rd-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 150 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of dust, drops of water, pinch of ice)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

40-ft radius, 20-ft tall cylinder of sleet; heavily obscures, difficult terrain, Dex saves vs falling.

title: Speak with Dead
body:
# Speak with Dead (3rd-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S,M (burning incense)
Duration: 10 minutes

Grant semblance of life to a corpse; ask it 5 questions; may be cryptic and knows what it knew in life.

title: Banishment
body:
# Banishment (4th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (item distasteful to target)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Cha save or banish target to harmless demiplane (native creatures) or to native plane (extraplanar).

title: Blight
body:
# Blight (4th-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Necrotic energy drains vitality; Con save or 8d8 necrotic damage (plants disadvantaged or instantly killed if nonmagical).

title: Confusion
body:
# Confusion (4th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S,M (3 walnut shells)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Creatures in 10-ft radius sphere must Wis save or act randomly each turn.

title: Conjure Minor Elementals
body:
# Conjure Minor Elementals (4th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Summon elementals of CR 2 or lower; more at higher slots.

title: Control Water
body:
# Control Water (4th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 300 ft
Components: V,S,M (drop of water and dust)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Control floods, part water, redirect flow, or whirlpool within a 100-ft cube.

title: Death Ward
body:
# Death Ward (4th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: 8 hours

If target drops to 0 HP, instead drops to 1. Also ignores first effect that would kill target instantly.

title: Dimension Door
body:
# Dimension Door (4th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 500 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Teleport yourself and one willing creature within 500 ft to a space you can visualize or describe.

title: Divination
body:
# Divination (4th-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (incense and sacrificial offering worth 25 gp)
Duration: Instant

Ask a single question about a goal/event/activity within 7 days; DM gives truthful reply.

title: Fabricate
body:
# Fabricate (4th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Convert raw materials into products (e.g., wood to bridge). Must be same material and volume.

title: Fire Shield
body:
# Fire Shield (4th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (bit of phosphorus or firefly)
Duration: 10 minutes

Sheath of cold or fire surrounds you; attackers take 2d8 cold or fire damage when hitting you; you gain resistance to chosen damage.

title: Freedom of Movement
body:
# Freedom of Movement (4th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (leather strap bound around arm)
Duration: 1 hour

Target ignores difficult terrain, paralysis, restraint, underwater penalties.

title: Greater Invisibility
body:
# Greater Invisibility (4th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target becomes invisible until spell ends, even if attacking or casting.

title: Guardian of Faith
body:
# Guardian of Faith (4th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: 8 hours

Large spectral guardian appears; hostile creatures that move within 10 ft must make Dex save or take 20 radiant damage (half on save). Disappears after 60 damage dealt.

title: Hallucinatory Terrain
body:
# Hallucinatory Terrain (4th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 300 ft
Components: V,S,M (stone, twig, bit of green plant)
Duration: 24 hours

Make terrain look, sound, and smell like another sort of terrain. Investigation check reveals it.

title: Ice Storm
body:
# Ice Storm (4th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 300 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of dust and few drops of water)
Duration: Instant

20-ft radius, 40-ft high cylinder; 2d8 bludgeoning + 4d6 cold damage (Dex save half); area becomes difficult terrain.

title: Locate Creature
body:
# Locate Creature (4th-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (bit of fur from bloodhound)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Sense direction of specific creature within 1,000 ft; blocked by running water or lead.

title: Phantasmal Killer
body:
# Phantasmal Killer (4th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target makes Wis save or becomes frightened; takes 4d10 psychic damage each turn until save ends.

title: Polymorph
body:
# Polymorph (4th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (caterpillar cocoon)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Transform creature into beast of CR <= target’s level. HP becomes that of new form.

title: Stoneskin
body:
# Stoneskin (4th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Target has resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, slashing.

title: Wall of Fire
body:
# Wall of Fire (4th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (small piece of phosphorus)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Create wall of fire (60 ft long, 20 ft high, 1 ft thick or circle 20 ft diameter). One side deals 5d8 fire damage (Dex save half).

title: Cloudkill
body:
# Cloudkill (5th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Creates a moving 20-ft-radius cloud of poison. Con save or 5d8 poison damage. Moves 10 ft away from you each round.

title: Cone of Cold
body:
# Cone of Cold (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (60-ft cone)
Components: V,S,M (small crystal or glass cone)
Duration: Instant

Creatures in cone make Con save or take 8d8 cold damage (half on save).

title: Commune
body:
# Commune (5th-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (incense and vial of holy or unholy water)
Duration: 1 minute

Ask your deity 3 yes/no questions. DM gives correct answers (may be unclear for future events).

title: Commune with Nature
body:
# Commune with Nature (5th-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

You become one with nature; gain knowledge of terrain, plants, minerals, bodies of water, people, or presence of powerful creatures within 3 miles (300 ft underground).

title: Contact Other Plane
body:
# Contact Other Plane (5th-level divination, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Self
Components: V
Duration: 1 minute

Mentally contact extraplanar entity. Int save or take 6d6 psychic damage and insanity for 1 minute. On success, you can ask 5 questions and receive correct answers.

title: Dispel Evil and Good
body:
# Dispel Evil and Good (5th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Protective aura. Attacks against fiends, undead, and celestials are at disadvantage. You can also end enchantments, banish extraplanar creatures, or suppress effects.

title: Dominate Person
body:
# Dominate Person (5th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Wis save or you charm a humanoid. You have control of its actions, and it obeys your commands. New save at end of each turn.

title: Dream
body:
# Dream (5th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Unlimited
Components: V,S,M (handful of sand, ink, quill)
Duration: 8 hours

Shape another creature’s dreams. Messenger can deliver message, appear monstrous, and cause psychic damage if target fails Wis save.

title: Flame Strike
body:
# Flame Strike (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of sulfur)
Duration: Instant

A 10-ft-radius, 40-ft-high cylinder of fire and radiant energy. Dex save or 4d6 fire + 4d6 radiant (half on save).

title: Geas
body:
# Geas (5th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 60 ft
Components: V
Duration: 30 days

Command a creature to carry out a service or refrain from an action. Wis save negates. On a fail, the creature takes 5d10 psychic damage each time it disobeys.

title: Greater Restoration
body:
# Greater Restoration (5th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (diamond dust worth 100 gp)
Duration: Instant

End one debilitating effect: exhaustion level, charm, petrification, curse, attunement to cursed item, or one reduction to ability scores or HP max.

title: Hallow
body:
# Hallow (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 24 hours
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (herbs, oils, incense worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: Until dispelled

Area becomes magically hallowed. Can bind extra effects (e.g., daylight, fear, immunity to charm).

title: Hold Monster
body:
# Hold Monster (5th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of iron)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target creature (any) must Wis save or be paralyzed. Repeat save at end of each turn.

title: Insect Plague
body:
# Insect Plague (5th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 300 ft
Components: V,S,M (grains of sugar, fat, and a drop of water)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

20-ft-radius sphere swarms with biting locusts. Con save or take 4d10 piercing damage. Area is difficult terrain.

title: Legend Lore
body:
# Legend Lore (5th-level divination)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (incense worth 250 gp, 4 ivory strips worth 50 gp each)
Duration: Instant

Bring to mind legends about a person, place, or object. The more specific the knowledge, the more precise the lore.

title: Mass Cure Wounds
body:
# Mass Cure Wounds (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Up to six creatures regain 3d8 + spellcasting modifier HP (more when cast at higher slots).

title: Mislead
body:
# Mislead (5th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

You become invisible while an illusory double appears. You can move the double and see/hear through it.

title: Modify Memory
body:
# Modify Memory (5th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target Wis save or charmed for the duration. You can alter memory of an event within last 24 hours (longer at higher slots).

title: Passwall
body:
# Passwall (5th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (sesame seeds)
Duration: 1 hour

Open a passage through wood, plaster, or stone (up to 20 ft long, 5 ft wide, 8 ft tall).

title: Planar Binding
body:
# Planar Binding (5th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 hour
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (jewel worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: 24 hours

Bind a celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend to your service if it fails Cha save.

title: Raise Dead
body:
# Raise Dead (5th-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 hour
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (diamond worth 500 gp)
Duration: Instant

Return a creature that has been dead no longer than 10 days to life with 1 HP. Removes nonmagical diseases/poisons, but not missing body parts or old age.

title: Reincarnate
body:
# Reincarnate (5th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 hour
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (rare oils worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: Instant

Creates a new adult body for a dead humanoid. Soul enters new body if willing. DM rolls on reincarnation table for race.

title: Scrying
body:
# Scrying (5th-level divination)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (focus worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

You can see/hear a particular creature. Wis save resists. Knowledge and possession of items improves chances.

title: Seeming
body:
# Seeming (5th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 8 hours

Change appearance of any number of creatures. Illusions last for the duration, but don’t hold up to physical inspection.

title: Telekinesis
body:
# Telekinesis (5th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Move creatures or objects with your mind. Strength contest vs creature, or move object up to 1,000 lb.

title: Teleportation Circle
body:
# Teleportation Circle (5th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,M (rare chalks/incenses worth 50 gp)
Duration: 1 round

Creates a circle linking to a permanent teleportation circle whose sigil you know.

title: Tree Stride
body:
# Tree Stride (5th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Step into a tree and exit another within 500 ft. Each turn, you can use bonus action to teleport again.

title: Wall of Force
body:
# Wall of Force (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (powdered quartz)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create an invisible wall of force that is immune to damage and can’t be dispelled by Dispel Magic. 10-ft panels form wall up to 100 ft long.

title: Wall of Stone
body:
# Wall of Stone (5th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (small block of granite)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create a wall of six 10-ft panels of stone. Each panel 10 ft x 10 ft x 6 in thick. Becomes permanent if concentration lasts full duration.

title: Arcane Gate
body:
# Arcane Gate (6th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 500 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

You create two linked teleportation portals (10 ft diameter), within range and line of sight.

title: Blade Barrier
body:
# Blade Barrier (6th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Wall of whirling blades appears. Creatures entering or starting turn take 6d10 slashing (Dex save half).

title: Chain Lightning
body:
# Chain Lightning (6th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 150 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of fur, amber, crystal, and silver pins)
Duration: Instant

Target and three others within 30 ft make Dex saves or take 10d8 lightning damage (half on save).

title: Circle of Death
body:
# Circle of Death (6th-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 150 ft
Components: V,S,M (pearl worth 500 gp)
Duration: Instant

A sphere of negative energy (60-ft radius) deals 8d6 necrotic damage (Con save half).

title: Conjure Fey
body:
# Conjure Fey (6th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 90 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 hour

Summon a fey creature or spirit of CR 6 or lower.

title: Contingency
body:
# Contingency (6th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (statuette of self worth 1,500 gp)
Duration: 10 days

Store a 5th level or lower spell to trigger automatically under specified conditions.

title: Create Undead
body:
# Create Undead (6th-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S,M (clay, bone, grave dirt)
Duration: Instant

Create up to 3 ghouls (more at higher slots) that obey you.

title: Disintegrate
body:
# Disintegrate (6th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (lodestone and dust)
Duration: Instant

Target must Dex save or take 10d6 + 40 force damage. Creature reduced to dust if killed. Disintegrates large objects.

title: Drawmij's Instant Summons
body:
# Drawmij's Instant Summons (6th-level conjuration, ritual)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (sapphire worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: Until dispelled

Imbue an object with a command word; you can summon it instantly to your hand regardless of distance or plane.

title: Find the Path
body:
# Find the Path (6th-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (divination tools worth 100 gp)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 day

Target knows the shortest path to a specific location familiar to you.

title: Flesh to Stone
body:
# Flesh to Stone (6th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S,M (lime, water, earth)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Con save or target restrained; on 3 failed saves becomes petrified.

title: Forbiddance
body:
# Forbiddance (6th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (incense and rare oils worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: 1 day

Wards a large area (40,000 sq ft) against planar travel and certain creatures; can also deal damage.

title: Globe of Invulnerability
body:
# Globe of Invulnerability (6th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (10-ft radius)
Components: V,S,M (glass bead)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

An immobile barrier prevents spells of 5th level or lower from affecting anything inside.

title: Guards and Wards
body:
# Guards and Wards (6th-level abjuration)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (burning incense, taper, powdered iron, and brimstone)
Duration: 24 hours

Wards a building with fog, webs, confusion, and more.

title: Harm
body:
# Harm (6th-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Target makes Con save or takes 14d6 necrotic damage, HP can't be reduced below 1.

title: Heal
body:
# Heal (6th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: Instant

Restore 70 HP to a creature. Ends blindness, deafness, and disease.

title: Heroes' Feast
body:
# Heroes' Feast (6th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 10 minutes
Range: 30 ft
Components: V,S,M (bowl worth 1,000 gp)
Duration: Instant

Create feast for up to 12. Removes poison, disease, fright, and grants immunity to poison/fear and +2d10 HP for 24h.

title: Magic Jar
body:
# Magic Jar (6th-level necromancy)
Casting Time: 1 minute
Range: Self
Components: V,S,M (gem or crystal worth 500 gp)
Duration: Until dispelled

Your soul moves into container. You can then possess humanoid bodies within 100 ft.

title: Mass Suggestion
body:
# Mass Suggestion (6th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 60 ft
Components: V,M (snake’s tongue and honeycomb)
Duration: 24 hours

Influence up to 12 creatures. Similar to Suggestion but longer duration.

title: Move Earth
body:
# Move Earth (6th-level transmutation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (iron blade, small bag of clay)
Duration: Concentration, up to 2 hours

Reshape dirt, sand, or clay in 40-ft cube. Works gradually, not instant structures.

title: Otto's Irresistible Dance
body:
# Otto's Irresistible Dance (6th-level enchantment)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 30 ft
Components: V
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Target begins dancing, losing Dex saves and attacks, attacks against have advantage.

title: Programmed Illusion
body:
# Programmed Illusion (6th-level illusion)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (bit of fleece and jade dust worth 25 gp)
Duration: Until dispelled

Illusion activated by condition; 30-ft cube maximum.

title: Sunbeam
body:
# Sunbeam (6th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Self (60-ft line)
Components: V,S,M (magnifying glass)
Duration: Concentration, up to 1 minute

Line of radiant light. Con save or 6d8 radiant + blinded until next turn. You can create a new beam each turn.

title: Transport via Plants
body:
# Transport via Plants (6th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 10 ft
Components: V,S
Duration: 1 round

Enter one plant and exit another you know within range instantly.

title: True Seeing
body:
# True Seeing (6th-level divination)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: Touch
Components: V,S,M (ointment worth 25 gp)
Duration: 1 hour

Target gains truesight to 120 ft, sees hidden doors, invisible creatures, and into the Ethereal Plane.

title: Wall of Ice
body:
# Wall of Ice (6th-level evocation)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 120 ft
Components: V,S,M (pinch of dust and drop of water)
Duration: Concentration, up to 10 minutes

Create wall of ice. Each 10-ft section has AC 12, 30 HP. Dex save or take 10d6 cold if destroyed.

title: Word of Recall
body:
# Word of Recall (6th-level conjuration)
Casting Time: 1 action
Range: 5 ft
Components: V
Duration: Instant

Instantly transports you and up to 5 creatures to a sanctuary designated when you cast the spell.
